title: Tracking Issue for proc_macro::{tracked_env, tracked_path}

labels.name: T-libs-api
labels.description: Relevant to the library API team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: C-tracking-issue
labels.description: Category: A tracking issue for an RFC or an unstable feature.

body:
Feature gate: `#![feature(proc_macro_tracked_env, track_path)]`

This is a tracking issue for `proc_macro::tracked*`, to allow adding files and environment variables to the build system's dependency tracking.

### Public API

```rust
// proc_macro

mod tracked_env {
    pub fn var<K: AsRef<OsStr> + AsRef<str>>(key: K) -> Result<String, VarError>;
}

mod tracked_path {
    pub fn path<P: AsRef<str>>(path: P);
}
```

### Steps / History

- [x] Implementation of `tracked_env::var`: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/74653
- [x] Implementation of `tracked_path::path`: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/84029
- [x] Add tracking issue: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/99516
- [ ] Change `path` to accept `AsRef<Path>` instead of `AsRef<str>`
- [ ] Design the public API
- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] Final comment period (FCP)
- [ ] Stabilization PR

### Unresolved Questions

- [ ] The full API design.
   - The implementaiton PRs were mostly focussed on the implementation details behind the scenes of `proc_macro`, but there's barely been any discussion on the public interface.
